CustomField.description: Stores the calculation type for works/business hours when calculating difference between two dates or adding a date and a value. Only applicable if Left1 Value1 and Math V1 to V2 are selected AND one of the Left1 Value1 or Left1 Value2 are date/datetime.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Select the calculation type for works/business hours when calculating difference between two dates or adding a date and a value. Only applicable if Left1 Value1 and Math V1 to V2 are selected AND one of the Left1 Value1 or Left1 Value2 are date/datetime.
CustomField.label: Left1 Calculate Using Hours
